divs: sighting detailsjan. 20. 2013 at 12:41 pm i witnessed a bright star like object moving super fast across the sky, it slowed down, paused for about 1 to 2 secs and got even brighter and bigger, then it took off at a rate of speed that i have never seen before, it seem to just disappear. it moved so fast toward the end of the sighting i am unsure where it went. there was no contrail, nor sound. it did not have wings, it was a good size orb\ball of light bigger than a star but not quite as big as a aspirin. i had a very good look at it thankfully, i was wearing sunglasses and i did not take my eyes off of it. the sky was clear, no clouds and sunny. there were a few planes in the area just before and after this with contrails and sound. the planes moved slow in comparison to this object.
Summary: Bright Star like Object moving extremely fast and paused got brighter and took off out of sight
